message.body: Chinese ambassador to US: We will take measures to fight back very soon - https://www.cnbc.com/2018/04/03/chinese-ambassador-to-us-we-will-take-measures-to-fight-back-very-soon.html

links.title: Chinese ambassador to US: We will take measures to fight back very soon
links.description: Ting Shen | Xinhua | Getty Images Speaking with CNBC, China's ambassador to the United States said his country would "fight back" against U.S. trade measures "very soon." Chinese ambassador to the U.S., Cui Tiankai, criticized what he called protectionism out of the White House. "Such protectionism will not protect anybody.

links.title: Apple has reportedly hired Google's search and AI chief
links.description: A shooting at YouTube's San Bruno, Calif. headquarters has resulted in four people being taken to the hospital. San Bruno police chief Ed Barberini said the extent of the injuries are unknown. A fifth person, a woman who may have been the shooter, is dead from a self-inflicted wound.

links.title: US proposes tariffs on 1,300 Chinese goods
links.description: The Trump administration on Tuesday published a list of about 1,300 Chinese exports that could be targeted for tariffs. The United States plans to apply the tariffs to about $50 billion worth of goods to punish China for its theft of trade secrets, including software, patents and other technology.
